Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
literally: to lift up (words); hence: = action by which humans utter certain words
= town; ◄ on the Phoenician coast; ► famous as sea port
= a sung dirge or lament at the death of a loved one; ◄ death of a friend or family member; ► expression of loss at one's death

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= town; ◄ on the Phoenician coast; ► famous as sea port
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= a place by which one can enter an area with limited access points, such as a city, a temple courtyard, a palace courtyard, or the sea.
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= town; ◄ on the Phoenician coast; ► famous as sea port
= a referent to a female participant addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= state in which an object has been affected by an event in its entirety
= state in which the outward appearance of humans or objects is pleasing to the eye
literally: heart; hence: = the location right in the middle of something else, such as the sea, the heavens, or a tree
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= causative process by which humans cause a condition to have all the required qualities
= state in which the outward appearance of humans or objects is pleasing to the eye

exact meaning unsure: = one of the evergreen trees commonly found in the Lebanon, with round leaves rather than flat; its fruit is a a mostly inedible seed bearing, fleshy cone; ≈ regarded as one of the glorious trees of the Lebanon
= mountain, also known as Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) Sion (שִׂיאֹון) and Sirion (שִׂרְיֹון) ◄ part of the Anti Lebanon range; located north east of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= flat object with a smooth surface; ◄ usually made of wood; ► used for construction or decoration

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= long wooden pole; ◄ part of a ship; ► functions as support of sail(s)

= a large size tree found either alone or in clumps or forests; ◄ one of the varieties of |iQuercus|i*; ► functioned as landmarks, grave marks or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; ≈ their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes
= region; ◄ north east of the River Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ► at one time ruled by king Og (עֹוג) later assigned to half of the tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= pole with a flat blade ► used to row or steer a boat through the water
= flat platform; ◄ made out of wooden planks; ► used to form the floor of a ship
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= a hard creamy white substance ◄ made from the tusk of elephants ► and often used to make ornaments and other articles; ≈ regarded as valuable
see יַעְַנָה (יַעֲנָה)

read בתאשׁרים = תְּאְַשּׁוּר (תְּאַשּׁוּר)|exact meaning unsure: = one of the evergreen trees commonly found in the Lebanon, with round leaves rather than flat; its fruit is a a mostly inedible seed bearing, fleshy cone; ≈ regarded as one of the glorious trees of the Lebanon
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH
= nation regarded as descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) possibly to be identified with Greece

= high quality woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of cloth and clothes; worn by the rich and by priests; used for the construction of the tabernacle; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness
= cloth with decorative patterns sewn into it by hand and therefore expensive; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= cloth, attached to a boat ► in such a way as to catch the wind and propel the boat through the water
= large sheet of fabric attached above a boat ► to catch the wind and thus move the boat forward through the water
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH
= people; ◄ probably located on Cyprus; ► trading with Tyre (צֹר)
= a relatively large, flat object made out of cloth or other materials, ► used to cover another object
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= town; ◄ Phoenician city north of Tyre (צֹר) famous as a seaport and sometimes referred to as Great Sidon; marked the northern boundary of the Promised Land
= town; ◄ located in northern Phoenicia on a small island off the coast; its people are considered descendants of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= causative action by which humans move the oars of a ship through a body of water; ► in order to make it move forward
= town; ◄ on the Phoenician coast; ► famous as sea port
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= person; ► works on a ship
= person who has been given a certain level of authority due to experience and skill
= town, ◄ located in Phoenicia, north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► and functionaing as the seaport of the major city of Byblos, which used to trade with Tyre (צֹר)
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

Node.gloss: to strengthen|to give strength, to fortify|to repair|to let prevail
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause humans and objects to be strong in a physical, political, or military sense
= state of disrepair of a construction
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= a person who works as a member of the crew of ship or boat

Node.gloss: to deal|to trade|to barter|to do business
Node.definition: = action by which persons or groups engage in the exchange of merchandise or services, as in the business of buying and selling
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= land and ethnic group, possibly to be identified with the Lydians ◄ located in Asia Minor; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם) ► known as archers
= ethnic group; ◄ regarded as descendants of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ)

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= head covering; ◄ made of metal; ► used by soldiers for protection
= state in which deities, humans, or animals have personal greatness and a high status, recognized and respected by others

literally: children of a town, region, nation; hence: = people, animals, or products that are inhabitants of or originating from a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the offspring of that place
= town; ◄ located in northern Phoenicia on a small island off the coast; its people are considered descendants of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= region, possibly to be identified with Hilakku; ◄ located in Cilicia; ► mercenaries from this area were fighting as part of the army of Tyre (צֹר)

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= inhabitants of a town called Gammad, possibly to be identified with Kumidi of El Amarna letters, a town east northeast of Sidon
= relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection
= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= causative process by which humans cause a condition to have all the required qualities
= state in which the outward appearance of humans or objects is pleasing to the eye
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= a person who goes around with merchandies or wares to sell and/or trade
= a large quantity of valuable resources, ownership of which affects the way people think and live
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence
= silvery white metal; ► used, together with copper, for the production of bronze
= a heavy bluish grey soft metal, ≈ associated with heavy weight
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= nation, usually identified with Greece; considered the descendants of Japheth (יֶפֶת) through his son Javan
= nation, ◄ possibly to be identified with Tabal, located in vicinity of the Black Sea; considered descendants of Japheth (יֶפֶת) through his son Tubal (תֻּבַל)
= nation, usually identified with Greece; considered the descendants of Japheth (יֶפֶת) through his son Javan
= a human being, as defined by the life principle that animates him/her
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= nation; ◄ located north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and regarded as founded by a person with the same name; ► renowned for its horses and mules

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= horse; ► primarily used for soldiers to ride on, but also for agricultural purposes

= male or female offspring of a male donkey and a female horse (or, but less common, a male horse and a female donkey); stronger than a donkey and more resistant to diseases than horses and donkeys; infertile; usually dark brown in color; has bigger ears than the parent horse; ► used for riding and as pack animals; ≈ associated with a lack of understanding
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce

literally: children of a town, region, nation; hence: = people, animals, or products that are inhabitants of or originating from a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the offspring of that place
= location; ◄ in the Arabian peninsula, ► home of an ethnic group with the same name
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= either the goods and products intended for trading, or the place where the trading was carried out
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
= a hard creamy white substance ◄ made from the tusk of elephants ► and often used to make ornaments and other articles; ≈ regarded as valuable

= a spiny tree up to 6 7 m. high; its leaves are compound, with the leaflets nearly opposite one another on the spine; it grows white flowers that hang in loose clusters, that give way to flat, papery seedpods about 6 cm long and 1 cm wide; found in Africa and locally known as zebrawood; ◄ Dalbergia melanoxylon; alternatively: = a tree which grows to 10 m. tall, with evergreen leaves; the inner part of its trunk is black; it is found in India and Sri Lanka: ◄ Diospyros ebenum; ► used by carvers, who inlay the wood with ivory
literally: to bring back; hence: = action by which humans give other humans the equivalent for goods received or owed, either in monetary value or in kind
= amount of goods with monetary value exchanged between two parties ► as gift or as payment for goods
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= a person who goes around with merchandies or wares to sell and/or trade
= (semi )precious stone with a blue color, possibly turquoise
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish
= cloth with decorative patterns sewn into it by hand and therefore expensive; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable

= high quality woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of cloth and clothes; worn by the rich and by priests and Levites; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness
= hard stony substance secreted by certain colonial marine animals as an external skeleton, typically forming large reefs; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = precious stone with a bright red color
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin
= town; ◄ in Ammon (עַמֹּון) ► captured by Jephthah (יִפְתָּח) possibly known for its wheat
= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

= dried resin produced by the liquidambar or lentisk terebinth tree; the sticky gray brown gum is obtained by making cuts in the trunk of the tree; ► aromatic and medicinal, and highly valued in trade with Egypt
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= town; ◄ in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of one of the Aramaean (אֲרָם) kingdoms
= a person who goes around with merchandies or wares to sell and/or trade
= a large quantity of valuable resources, ownership of which affects the way people think and live

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= town; ◄ located in Syria (אֲרָם)
= soft wavy undercoat of hairy animals such as sheep, ► used to weave a fabric from which clothing was made; ≈ associated with whiteness, purity, and softness
= whitish color ◄ of raw wool or unshorn sheep|= location
= unknown location
= nation, usually identified with Greece; considered the descendants of Japheth (יֶפֶת) through his son Javan

= nation or area; ◄ either to be considered founded by a person with the same name and located somewhere on the Arabian peninsula, or to be identified with Izalla in northeastern Mesopotamia; ► trading partner of Tyre (צֹר) |= fabric produced by interlacing long threads passing in one direction with others at a right angle to them
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence

= fragrant substance ◄ made from the inner bark of the cassia tree (Cinnamomum cassia), found in India and Sri Lanka, ► and used for the preparation of perfume and anointing oil; the buds of this tree are used to flavor and season food; its leaves and pods may have medicinal qualities

meaning unsure; either: (1) = type of grass that grows in clumps to more than a meter high and has stiff leaves like sword grass and has a sweet smell; ◄ Cymbopogon; ► oil is extracted by boiling and distilling the leaves; used in the oil for anointing priests; or (2) = a type of reed with stiff leaves, distinguished by its green flower head that grows on a stalk to about 50 cm high; ◄ Acorus calamus or Calamus; ► the scented leaves and more strongly scented tubers have traditionally been used medicinally and to make fragrances, and the dried and powdered tubers have been used as a substitute for ginger, cinnamon and nutmeg
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= location; ◄ in the Arabian peninsula, ► home of an ethnic group with the same name
= piece of cloth used to cover an object
meaning unsure; probably: = type of cloth; ◄ woven material; ► used as saddle blanket
= action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) or in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה)
= land, ◄ located east and south east of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► consisting primarily of steppe and desert and inhabited by nomadic tribes
= ethnic group consisting of Arab (עַרְבִי) nomads or Bedouin, known as warriors and sheep herders; ◄ descendants of Kedar
= a person who goes around with merchandies or wares to sell and/or trade
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a young male sheep

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership
= dominant male goat in a צֹאן (צֹאן) ≈ associated with authority
= a person who goes around with merchandies or wares to sell and/or trade
= country; ◄ exact location unknown; ► known for its wealth and actively involved in trading; regarded as descendants of a man with the same name; its queen visited king Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
= literally: head; hence: = state in which products have a quality that is superior to anything else

= generic terms for spices and aromatics, but sometimes specifically: fragrant resin ◄ produced by the balsam tree; ► used as ingredient for anointing oil and fragrant incense, and as perfume; ≈ considered very valuable
= small object ◄ consisting of a variety of stone that is considered precious because of its beauty and scarcity; ► used as ornament or decoration; ≈ association with honor, majesty, and glory
= state in which humans or objects are considered valuable and desirable
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce

= town; ◄ in northern Mesopotamia; ► place where Abraham's (אַבְרָם) father settled when coming from Ur (אוּר) and where his relatives continued to live; later destroyed by Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) trading partner of Tyre (צֹר)
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia; ► traded with Tyre (צֹר)
= region ◄ in northern Mesopotamia
= country; ◄ exact location unknown; ► known for its wealth and actively involved in trading; regarded as descendants of a man with the same name; its queen visited king Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= town, ◄ possibly in Mesopotamia; ► traded with Tyre (צֹר)
exact meaning unsure; probably: = cloth of an exceptionally high quality
exact meaning unknown; probably: = an overgarment that hangs loosely from the shoulders or is wrapped around the body
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish
= cloth with decorative patterns sewn into it by hand and therefore expensive; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a heavy woven fabric, ► used as a floor covering
= cloth with a variety of colors

= piece of stout cord; ◄ made by twisting together palm fibres, linen, or reeds; ► used for tying and keeping things together, climbing, measuring, drawing things to oneself, making traps, etc.; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to refer to conditions that try to take control of people; a rope tied around the head is a symbol of submission

Node.gloss: to wrap|to bandage|to tie|to bind up
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans wrap something around an inanimate object
meaning unsure; probably: = pertaining to being strong and therefore not easily broken
= an area in which people gather to buy and sell supplies, livestock, and other goods
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left
= state in which objects have relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.
literally: heart; hence: = the location right in the middle of something else, such as the sea, the heavens, or a tree
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= causative action by which humans move the oars of a ship through a body of water; ► in order to make it move forward

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
literally: heart; hence: = the location right in the middle of something else, such as the sea, the heavens, or a tree
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= a large quantity of valuable resources, ownership of which affects the way people think and live

Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause humans and objects to be strong in a physical, political, or military sense
= state of disrepair of a construction

Node.gloss: to deal|to trade|to barter|to do business
Node.definition: = action by which persons or groups engage in the exchange of merchandise or services, as in the business of buying and selling
literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control
literally: heart; hence: = the location right in the middle of something else, such as the sea, the heavens, or a tree
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= person; ► works on a ship
= open land with enough grass and plants to graze cattle or flocks of sheep and goats

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= pole with a flat blade ► used to row or steer a boat through the water
= a person who works as a member of the crew of ship or boat
= person; ► works on a ship
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= state in which condition or action is motivated or accompanied by deep distress
literally: to cause to go up; hence: = causative process by which an object is caused to appear on top of or over another one
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= powdery residue left after the burning of a substance; normally deposited outside of a village or city; ► used by mourners to put on their heads or roll themselves into; ≈ associated with things that are fine and powdery and easily scattered by the wind, with low status, and possibly with mortality as well
literally: to make bald baldness; hence: = action by which a human being uses a sharp implement to remove the hair on (part of) his scalp, ► as a sign of mourning

= a hairless patch on the head of an animal or human being in a location where hair normally grows; ≈ this can be a natural phenomenon, as on the head of a vulture, but it can also be created by shaving the head as a sign of mourning

Node.gloss: to gird oneself|to put on (clothes, armor)
Node.definition: = action by which someone ties a belt or piece of cloth around the waist; hence also: to put on clothes or armor
= a coarse dark material ◄ made of goat or camel hair; ► worn next to the skin as a sign of mourning or repentance

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
literally: bitter; hence: = state in which humans are in deep distress

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include wailing (ילל) tearing one's clothes, putting on sackcloth (שַׂק) covering oneself with dust or ashes, fasting (צום) or eating specific food, cutting oneself (גדד) shaving one's head (קרח) covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event
= state in which condition or action is motivated or accompanied by deep distress
literally: to lift up (words); hence: = action by which humans utter certain words
= action by which humans sing a mournful song ► to give expression to their grief
= a sung dirge or lament at the death of a loved one; ◄ death of a friend or family member; ► expression of loss at one's death

Node.gloss: to lament|to mourn|to bewail in a song
Node.definition: = to sing a song in which one expresses one's grief at the loss of a loved one or the destruction of a town or nation

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= town; ◄ on the Phoenician coast; ► famous as sea port
= state in which humans or objects have been removed from existence, through total destruction
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

Node.gloss: to give (one's) fill > to make contented

Node.definition: = state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= a large quantity of valuable resources, ownership of which affects the way people think and live
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= a deep place, usually filled with water; ≈ associated with hardship
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a person who goes around with merchandies or wares to sell and/or trade
= something that instills an intense and overpowering fear in someone else; ≈ often associated with death and darkness

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
